1.「……<pc>さん 今の話 私も聞いたわ。: <pc> I heard what you just said...

4.「そ そういや リンジャの塔の場所を聞かれて| 教えてやったら すぐ出ていったか: Well, he asked me where Rinja's tower was,|and I told him, and he left right away, so I|think that's where he was headed, but...

9.「私 姉さんの日記を盗んだ サダクを追って| リンジャの塔まで 行ってみるわ。|: I followed Sadak, who stole your sister's|diary, to Rinja's tower...<pc> I want you to come with me.

15.「おぉ……これが あの祈願の魔像。| なんと 素晴らしい……。: Oh... This is the prayer... How wonderful...

If the adults of the city prayed to this|statue, the power of their prayers would|completely erode the city of Cerredo into a|

21.「これは 私のジャマをしようとする| 人間の小娘が 持っていた物で なんでも|: This was in the possession of a little human|girl who wanted to mess with me, and she said|it told me about a false world...

22.「万が一を考えて 奪っておきましたが| 誰も あの小娘のことなど 信じていますま: I took it from her just in case, but no one|would believe that little... She's nothing.|She's a trinket.

... No matter how insignificant it may seem,|you must nip it in the bud as soon as|possible. Don't underestimate the power of|
|man.

28.「これさえあれば 計画は成ったも同然。| そして 偽りの世界の侵食を果たせば|: With this, my plan is complete. And once I've|eroded this false world, my career will be at|my mercy.

I didn't know Sadak was in league with the|demons. If we don't do something, the town is|in danger... I have to let everyone know|

|and bring them back to this place...
